attributes.action: Move national government (Parliament) meeting locations on an annual basis.
attributes.background: The majority of us, feel that national government is disconnected from people to whom they serve, this is all across Britain from the on the far Scotland, Midlands and Plymouth area. Therefore they should discuss national government (Parliament) move annually around Britain. Not including  documents

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The Government and Parliament are different. They have different roles and do different things.You can find out more about this here:

http://www.parliament.uk/about/how/role/parliament-government/

We’re not sure whether you want the UK Government’s private meetings or the UK Parliament's public meetings to move. We think you want the UK Parliament meetings to move (House of Commons and the House of Lords meetings which are televised). We’re also not sure what you mean by “Not including documents”. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
